text:
Ilana Rose Glazer (born April 12, 1987) is an American comedian, director, producer, writer, and actress. She co-created and co-starred, with Abbi Jacobson, the Comedy Central series "Broad City". She was twice nominated for the Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Actress in a Comedy Series for the series.
Glazer also starred in the 2017 movie "Rough Night".

annotations.surface_form: Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Actress in a Comedy Series
